column5: The new Lowrance HDS units are going to offer Side Viewing Sonar as an add-on in 2009. This is great news for Lowrance users that have been looking to pick up any of the new HDS units.  Official Press Release from Lowrance...  Side-Viewing Sonar Option for New High Definition Systems  -sheldon
lowrance rep was mentioning this at the show, I will have to hold off on the 'bird side imaging till I see how the lowrance system works
